皾字的基本解释

皾
dú
藏弓箭的器具。
滑。

皾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dú］
［《廣韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
(1)同“韇”。藏弓箭的器具。参见“皾丸”。
(2)滑。

皾字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【皮字部】　皾； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页792第23
【唐韻】【集韻】?徒谷切，音瀆【廣韻】滑也。【玉篇】貯弓器。又皾㿪，箭器也。【集韻】弓矢韇也。今謂之胡鹿。【揚子·方言】所以藏箭弩，謂之箙弓，謂之鞬。或謂之?【註】牛犢也。　【說文】本作韇。

皾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
皾字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
皾
du
Apparatus for hiding bows and arrows.
slip.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dú］
["Guangyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
(1) Same as "韇". Apparatus for hiding bows and arrows. See "Yi Wan".
(2) Slippery.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Pi Zi Department] 　皾; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 792 23
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Tu Gu cut, Yindu [Guang Yun] slippery. [Jade articles] Bow storage device. You Yi 㿪, arrows are also. [Ji Yun] Bow arrow also. This is called Hulu. [Yangtze Dialect] Therefore, Tibetan arrows and crossbows are called "Zhongbow" and "Zhiyan". Or is it called? [Note] The calf is also.　【Said Wen】This is Yun.
